posts.content:
Just saw this on the evening news...

http://www.telegraph.co.uk/news/newstop ... crash.html

Such a terrible loss of life. The driver was obviously a big landy fan (he appears to have been a member of several 4x4 forums) and his modifications appear to have lead to a horrific accident. No one would knowingly drive their vehicle in dangerous condition would they?

I'm having a night off from tinkering tonight but I just thought it would be good if we all stood back from our projects for a moment and thought hard about what we've been doing. This case could have severe implications for the car modification schene and the motor repair trade too.

My thoughts are with his family.

Keep it safe folks.

yes it was on some news programme last week! a pic of his upturned long wheel based landy in the river.
i thought about the loss of life that has happened, but the news and police had blown it out in such a way that any mods done to vehicles (non-factory) are death traps! and accidents waiting to happen.......
